Set up a new path for the log file

setConfPath

public void setConfPath(java.lang.String path)
Set up new path for the configuration file

Parameters:
path - new path of the file ( make sure the folder already exists !!! )
See Also:
*** WARNING *** Changing the path of the configuration file name may result in loss of log IDs

setConfFile

public void setConfFile(java.lang.String file)
Set up a new name for the configuration file

Parameters:
file - new name of the configuration file ( DEFAULT: RMILogger.conf )
See Also:
*** WARNING *** Changing the name of the configuration file name may result in loss of log IDs

setError

public void setError(int type,
                     java.lang.String msg,
                     boolean scr,
                     boolean det)
Method that displays / prints the log messages

Parameters:
1st: - warning type ( 0 - Warning Message, 1 - Error Message, 2 - Severe Error Message )
2nd: - Message to be displayed / printed in the log
3rd: - Message on Screen ( true - Display message on screen, false - Do NOT display message on screen )
4th: - Level of details ( true - display / print a full description of the error, false - display / print a summary of the error )
